title: sunny 4/5BR steps to Tufts, Red & Green lines
posting_body: You'll love this bright & sunny Somerville apartment with large kitchen, onsite laundry and classic wood floors.
Easy walking access to two T stops (Davis Sq Red & Ball Sq Green line) and bus lines, offering quick and convenient transport to universities across Boston.
The house is practically on Tufts campus.
Enjoy beautiful Powderhouse park and local restaurants across the street, public library nearby, and the Minuteman Bike path for recreation & commuting.
The flexible floor plan includes a lower level with 2 BRs and a full bath, and an upper level with 2 or 3BR (depending on how you want to use them) and a 1/2 bath.
Kitchen, living room, dining room, sunroom, small office area, and a small back porch looking over Tuft's triangle field.
Enclosed bike parking available under the back porch.
